roleset.name: honor, show respect to
roleset.note: CELEBRATE-V NOTES: A marginal usage, to be sure. (from celebrate.01-v)

example.name: well, ok, maybe once
example.text: A security guard at a cargo terminal, he wears a Sons of Italy jacket and cap celebrating ``The US 1 Band.''
example.arg: a Sons of Italy jacket and cap

example.name: with reason
example.text: Mary celebrated John for finishing his dissertation.

roleset.name: have a party, occasion to mark an event (party)
roleset.note: CELEBRATE-V NOTES: Two senses could be disambiguated by the kind of entity in arg1:persons would be in celebrate.01, dates or events in celebrate.02. (from celebrate.02-v)
CELEBRATION-N NOTES: Added due to expansion of Nombank. Comparison to 'celebrate'. VN class judgement-33. Framed by Katie. (from celebration.01-n)

example.name: party hearty
example.text: [They]-1 don't even give a nod to human sensibilities by *trace*-1 celebrating Halloween.

example.name: Arg 1
example.text: The celebration of the 60th anniversary of victory in the world's anti-fascist war
example.arg: of the 60th anniversary of victory in the world's anti-fascist war

example.name: Another arg 1
example.text: a worldwide effot during celebration of the millennium

example.name: 40th and anniversary are treed independantly
example.text: The color reference system was launched at the CTI's 40th anniversary celebration
